name: Grag Theft Nutt 2: Heroin Heist
description:
THIS IS NOT A GTA-LIKE!

I developed a payday-ish speedrunning game. Right now there are 5 levels, all take place in Uzbekistan, where you're robbing a bank as fast as possible. There is an easter egg to get a Pretty OP weapon, that will be balanced in the next area.
There are 2 primaries: Auto and Shotgun

And 3 secondaries: Pistol, Revolver and CumGun.

I should pump out an update pretty soon, be ready.
